about_the_game:
In this Screw Drivers Supporter Pack, there are four new colors to paint your vehicles in. Three of them have a special metal material and should make for very pretentious and royal machines!

In order for your pompous vehicles to stand out even more, you can attach license plates to them. Now you can finally make sure that your car is properly registered with the official authorities and you should not run into any legal problems. Well, maybe depends on how you drive…

And last but not least you can celebrate your victories but also your defeat by launching one or multiple confetti cannons.

Thanks for your amazing support and see you on track!
detailed_description:
In this Screw Drivers Supporter Pack, there are four new colors to paint your vehicles in. Three of them have a special metal material and should make for very pretentious and royal machines!

In order for your pompous vehicles to stand out even more, you can attach license plates to them. Now you can finally make sure that your car is properly registered with the official authorities and you should not run into any legal problems. Well, maybe depends on how you drive…

And last but not least you can celebrate your victories but also your defeat by launching one or multiple confetti cannons.

Thanks for your amazing support and see you on track!

name: Screw Drivers - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz quad-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: If you want to support us and the development of Screw Drivers, you can purchase this Supporter Pack which includes four special materials to color your vehicles, a confetti cannon and a license plate.
